title: Russo Chiropractic Clinic | The #1 Chiropractor Metairie, LA
description: Russo Chiropractic - Top-Rated Chiropractor in Metairie, LA. Corrective chiropractic care at an affordable price. Make an appointment today!
cleaned_text: Get Pain Free - Call Dr. Russo Dr. Russo is a top-rated chiropractor in Metairie, Louisiana. Find relief from your pain and schedule an appointment today! At Russo Chiropractic in Metairie, Dr. Rusty Russo treats and fixes the root cause of your problem, not just the symptoms. Our Metairie chiropractor is a research-based corrective and rehabilitative chiropractic clinic where spinal and extremity injuries are treated using the most advanced equipment and procedures known. We also co-manage our patients with many local medical doctors and surgeons for a collaborative and holistic effect of healthcare. Russo Chiropractic Clinic has proudly been treating patients in Metairie since 2005. We treat a huge range of injuries and conditions. We're happy to take on new patients continually. We have years of experience in delivering positive outcomes for our patients.
